reviews.review: meu nível de inteligência transcendeu depois de jogar isso

A really fun game to play by yourself or with a friend. I suggest beginning by playing through the single player mode first, then get into the CO-OP, there is a lot of fun to be had in this game. I think anyone can complete this game no matter how dumb they are. It is made so well that the levels are hard to figure out for everyone but after some time you just figure it out. You can also go achievment hunting in this game, I haven't done it yet but I am thinking about doing it. Most of the achievments are from CO-OP. Anyways, it is just a really good game and I would pay more than 0,8 Euro on sale. Just buy it, trust me!
